Description: The trio-alif (ا - أ - إ): Same shape, different location of alif, absence & different location of hamza (ء), in different position in the word (just prononciation)

Title_En: The trio baa, taa and thaa
Description: The trio beh, teh, theh (ب - ت – ث): Same shape, different number & location of dots

Title_En: The trio jiim, haa and khaa
Description: The trio jeem, hah, khah (ج - ح – خ): Same shape, different location of a dot
The duo dal and thal (د – ذ): Same shape, absence of a dot
The duo reh and zain (ر – ز): Same shape, absence of a dot
The duo seen and sheen (س – ش): Same shape, absence of three dots
The sad and dad (ص – ض): Same shape, absence of a dot
The tah and zah (ط – ظ): Same shape, absence of a dot
The duo ain and ghain (ع – غ): Same shape, absence of a dot
The duo feh and qaf (ف – ق): Same shape, different number of dots
The duo kaf and lam (ك – ل): Same shape, absence of hamza (ء)
The duo meem and noon (م – ن): No specific criterion, just different letters

Title_En: The trio haa, waaw and yaa
Description: The trio heh waw yeh (ه - و - ي): No specific criterion, jusy different letters

Title_En: The vowels alif, waaw and yaa
